website_summaries.verdict: This longtime fan favorite is consistent in its ability to cleanse gently and provide balanced results.
pros: With more than 70 years in the business, this brand has fine-tuned the art of dissolving dirt without stripping the skin of its good oils
We love that this product feels more like a gel and wipes away easily
cons: Works great for general day-to-day cleansing, but does not remove heavy makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not the Gentle Facial Cleanser I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this version is NOT the gentle facial cleanser. This version is a clear-like substance with a slight fragrance. I am dumping it and buying the gentle facial cleanser, which is the white viscous solution I have used forever. Packaging is too close.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the rating scales are kinda funny. Like this product asks for rating on scent but really it has no scent at all. It works great for sensitive skin and helps control acne. I’ve tried other products but this has proven to be fast acting for me and clears me up quick. When I have breakouts in other parts of my body like chest of back this helps there too. I am brand loyal to this product because of how well It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash...... EVER
customer_reviews.text: I ave super dry skin and this is the only cleanser I use. I’ve spent hundreds on different washes and they either weren’t impressive or dried my skin out. This is the best for dry skin or normal skin. I can’t speak for oily. I will never be without or use anything else. It removes all my makeup and the large bottle lasts months. One pump is all I need. Do not hesitate it’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: United1981

customer_reviews.title: Best product I’ve used.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had to deal with acne. It’s always been an issue for me since I also have really dry skin. This product has controlled my facia acny very well. I’ve been using it for over a year recommended by my dermatologist and it has been great help. I have sensitive skin so this is the perfect one for me. Smells really good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Valerin

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because tons of people recommended it only to have my dermatologist tell me it's not non comedogenic (even though it says it is on the bottle) .. disappointed, should have done more research
customer_reviews.author: Chellsea

customer_reviews.title: Different from the scent I have used before
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this brand, but this cleanser is completely different from the scent I have used before, and the taste is so heavy that I have to endure the scent every time I use it. It's just that the cleansing effect should be the same as before, so I'm too lazy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but not from here!
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial cleanser from drugstore. Not sure if I got a bad one but the one I bought here has a strong chemical smell and the after wash feel is totally different from the one I have been using for two years. I almost positive that I got a fake one. I will dispose this one and purchase from drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: LoveShopping

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been asked how do I keep my skin so clear. Cetaphil is my answer every time. This is the best facial wash on the market. It cleanses your face of excess oils without leaving your face stiff dry. Between this product and exfoliating often, I’ve always had amazing skin. I’ve been using this product since I was 13 and I’m now 22 and I’ve hardly ever broken out too badly in my life. It lasts a long time too so I only have to purchase it 2-3 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rives

customer_reviews.title: Daily Facial Cleanser vs Gentle Skin Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was purchasing Gentle Skin Cleanser and instead Purchased Daily Facial Cleanser. Did not like the fragrance associated with the facial cleaner - need to pay closer attention. Product arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lavetta L. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: best frugal option for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My sensitive skin loves this and so does my wallet. This is my go to face wash and this big container last forever. It’s very light little to no sent witch is a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Curlfriend500

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I like how gentle this cleanser is. I really think it's been good for my acne-prone skin. My skin isn't totally clear, but I think it's getting better.
customer_reviews.author: N. Finger

customer_reviews.title: it is as described!
customer_reviews.text: just as described, no mess in box! and is the right cleanser, right size and cheaper here than at stores near me. thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: melissa drabek

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This product is sooo great! Massage it on ur skin for a little and let it sit for a minute, you will feel your skin getting cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Parker

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin , no smell or lather overall good
customer_reviews.text: Using this from 3 years, good for oily and sensitive skin types. No smell and gentle on skin. Overall worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ShivaR

customer_reviews.title: Great at controlling oil
customer_reviews.text: A few months back I had my first demonologist appointment. I struggle with break outs and acne scars. I got this as it was recommended by the doctor. It has really controlled oil on my face. My glands were producing to much oil and this really does control that. Highly recommended and I have not complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: This product has been recommended to me by 2 different dermatologists. I use it everyday and it’s the best
customer_reviews.author: jc liane riggs

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best for my sensitive, oily, acne-prone skin. Nothing else leaves me feeling clean without irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Pump Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The pump dispenser does not work. This is a major inconvenience. I doubt I'll buy this product again. To add insult to injury the so-called support function on the product reviews web page is blocked.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 teen daughters- both have sensitive skin. Both of my girls have remarked on how their skin feels great after using it and they notice the one or two pimples the use to get are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Erin de Ridder

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. Finish off with Eucerin anti wrinkle face cream and leaves my face looking clear. I’m 39 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin glow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clean lookser and makes my skin gorgeous, lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Diane F.

customer_reviews.title: It was good
customer_reviews.text: Works good for making skin soft but I broke out bad
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all skin types!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have oily to dry skin. This is the only cleanser I have used that doesn't dry my skin out, not only is my skin clean, but it is moisturized. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: A must have cleanser for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleanser I will use! My skin is super sensitive and this stuff works so well and so gently
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A classic!
customer_reviews.text: Can never go wrong with Cetaphil. Gentle enough for delicate skin on face but powerful enough to remove makeup.
customer_reviews.author: kalanit

customer_reviews.title: It's safe for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It is a good cleanser. I still use a separate produce for eye make-up removing. Your skin feels fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Greshamgal

customer_reviews.title: A little strong but better than soap.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but the gentle cleanser is easier on my face. I only have to use one squirt of this, versus two squirts of the gentle cleanser to clean my face in the shower. But this stuff is stronger. Works well enough but may be harsh on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sheahan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Leaves my skin dry and burning. Also cant be returned. Save your money and dont buy it
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Works well on combo-skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin with a few stubborn break outs and this cleanser is heaven sent. It isn’t too harsh on the skin but a moisturizer is needed after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle cleanser with no smell! Doesn’t dry my skin out!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan N. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Cleanses well, powdery soft scent.
customer_reviews.text: Good cleanser but I didn’t realize there’s a powdery fragrance which makes my eyes/noses water. I wish I knew this was different than the non-fragrance version under Cetaphil Gentle cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: does what it’s supposed to so i have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. It is not to drying on my sensitive skin. Great for daily use, since I use it twice a day and I do not get an irritation or dryness.
customer_reviews.author: sdough10

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: In love with this cleanser!!! It does not dry my skin
customer_reviews.author: LeysaRodgz

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging but love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I’ve been using it for years but arrived with a broke pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kgirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this face wash did work very well on my face especially since i have sensitive skin, my face did feel very clean after i used it :)
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good product but showed up leaking everywhere in the package. Plunger up and cap badly loose. Too lazy to ship back but be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The facial cleanser has a masking fragrance that's isn't good IMO
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that a facial cleanser from this brand would have a fragrance. Now I know.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Walker

customer_reviews.title: A lucky accident!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this by mistake. I usually get the Gentle Cleanser. Was surprised by how much more I like this one! Great scent. Leaves skin clean but not dry. It’s my new facial cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: FLGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Cetaphil
customer_reviews.text: Like the smoothness. My dermatologist had patients use to wash face in office. I started using at home. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UNABLE TO EXCHANGE FOR THE RIGHT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the daily facial cleanser and received the gentle cleanser. Unfortunately this item is not available to return or exchange or anything, so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: False listing information
customer_reviews.text: Product says daily facial cleaner, yet I received another cetaphil wash (not the face wash). The listing are not correct.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy R.

customer_reviews.title: I bought it since I heard that it was good for removing oil but it actually made me break ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it since I heard that it was good for removing oil but it actually made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Monce Salazar

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, just a little broken
customer_reviews.text: I love the face wash soo much but came with a broken pump so had to take two stars
customer_reviews.author: Josaphina brinkerhoff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: My daily go to, been using it for past 5yrs
customer_reviews.author: Meets

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash for sensitive skin. Trust me, I’ve tried them all..
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Perez

customer_reviews.title: This is better because it's clear colored and helps dry out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Before, I used the Cetaphil skin cleanser for my acne-prone face. This is better because it's clear colored and helps dry out the pimples. I just apply Cetaphil moisturizer afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product. First the photos do not match the product delivered. The photos are for the gentle cleanser and the listing is for the daily cleanser. Second the official cetaphil website says that the product is unscented. The bottle I received is VERY strongly scented. Third the back label has the wrong formatting when you compare to internet photos, lists the ingredients in the wrong order, and does not have the trademark sign next to the word Cetaphil. Fourth the plastic is not the same shade as my other bottle.
customer_reviews.author: HJB

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Wash, but Prime failed me
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash, but was seriously disappointed with the fact that although i have prime and free 2 day shipping, this took 6 days to get to me. That sucked. But the face wash rocks. Keeps my skin clean, clear, and smooth. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Saffie

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT the Gentle Skin Cleanser You May Be Hoping For
customer_reviews.text: Cetaphil shoppers beware! Cetaphil has a proliferation of products and so choosing the right one requires quite a bit of attention to detail. This product rating is for the Daily Facial Cleanser. It is quite dreadful. The consistency is clear like a gel. The substance can be inadvertently tasted when washing your face and it is unpleasant. What I was shopping for was a daily facial wash for normal-dry skin. The product I should have, and advise you to buy, is the Gentle Cleanser. I believe that has the usual creamy white look and feel that's true to my Cetaphil brand experience. Hope this feedback steers you to the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Daily Facial Cleanser is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the DAILY facial cleanser. It is gentle on my skin but removes all my makeup and makes my face feel soft. (The Gentle Skin Cleanser by Cetaphil is absolutely horrible though. They come in an identical bottle though. The only difference is one says Daily Facial Cleaner, the other says Gentle Skin Cleanser. Don't confuse the two. :). )
customer_reviews.author: Tara Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love This Face Cleanser for Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: I am submitting this review as a user of this product who does not wear makeup. I clean my face twice per day (sometimes more if I have had to apply sunscreen) and this cleanser is easy to use, cleans well and leaves my skin feeling soft. Love the fact that it is not a harsh cleanser and does not have a drying affect to my skin. Would recommend cleansing cloths for removal of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: wcmissions

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable even if broken !
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and order it often. Shipped in a flimsy envelope and the nozzle was completely broken and unusable. No return or exchange program. Completely unacceptable. If it’s not able to be returned ship it in a damn box so it’s not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cleaner I ever had
customer_reviews.text: believe me I have tried some of the expensive ones like elemis, and facil soaps, and cleansing cloth. butthis is still the best a little goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle been using it for years
customer_reviews.text: This is a very gentle cleansing facial soap. I absolutely love it. I have been using this for over 5 years now. I use a Clinique regimen but I replaced my Clinique face soap with this facial soap. (:
customer_reviews.author: @m!@

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out but I know plenty of people ...
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out but I know plenty of people this product works for. I prefer the gentle skin cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cleanser
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite cleanser. I can tell if i go out of town and dont use it for a few days. Highly recommend for combo (breakout) prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: MRP

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the daily facial cleanser but received the gentle skin cleanser instead and when I tried to return it, it said it wasn't eligible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day and really like it. Makes my face feel good!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Using this for the first time at 40 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Using this for the first time at 40 and wish I'd done it sooner. It has made my skin much less prone to acne, which is impressive because I'm four months post-partum and wearing sunblock every day, which would usually cause me skin troubles. Not too drying, but I'm only using once a day before bed. I like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sally McKleinfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Very thorough cleanser. Leaves your skin clean and not feeling stripped of it's natural oils.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Dee L Reinbold

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the smell and it leaves my skin feeling dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cmill7

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the results I'm getting
customer_reviews.text: This is the first facial cleanser that is actually working for my skin. I suggest anyone to give it a try it is good for sensitive skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nucatola

customer_reviews.title: Comparable price
customer_reviews.text: My wife and kids of used this for years and works
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Product works great for my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Product works great for my oily skin. It washes off easily and doesn't leave any form of residue. Always double check your skin type, this product is for normal to oily skin. If you have dry skin there are other products out there for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cree

customer_reviews.title: Best Skin Care Ever
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I knew how much this product would benefit my skin a long time ago. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: VangieCamille

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the price. Love this on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Norman

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleansing product on my combo skin without drying it out
customer_reviews.author: Leitha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this has helped me so much with my skin issues
customer_reviews.author: Gwendoline Duren

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had a dumb dumb moment when I bought this. I completely forgot that cleansers are not lotions, they are washes. Cleansers typically do not work for me. They dry out my face and I'm oily by the end of the day. But it's a slight improvement from nothing at all. This came and I thought, 'Nuts. Oh well. Maybe this one will be different.' Nope. Been using it for over a month and my face is dry (feels stiff) when I get out of the shower, is oily by the end of the day and I've had non stop tiny pimples around my mouth and nose. Back to lotion for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gimella

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It helps much more than the expensive medicines dermatologists prescribe
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Cetaphil
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! It does a great job at removing oil and makeup but is still gentle on the skin and non-drying. I personally prefer this to other products because it seems to clean my skin more effectively. The scent to me is so mild. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

product_meta.title: Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser, 16 oz
product_meta.description: Cetaphil daily facial cleanser, normal to oily skin, for normal to oily skin. Removes excess oil without drying. Rinses clean. Non-comedogenic/fragrance free. Dermatologist recommended. This effective yet gentle facial cleanser was originally formulated for dermatologists to keep normal to oily skin clean and healthy. Removes surface oils, dirt and makeup without leaving skin tight or overly dry. Rinses clean without leaving any pore-clogging residue. Gentle enough for everyday use.
feature_bullets: Removes surface oils, dirt and makeup without leaving skin tight or overly dry.
The package dimension of the product is 5.3cmL x 9.7cmW x 18.8cmH
